ErrorMessage.ErrorFormat: Unable to enumerate changes at the DbPeerSyncProvider for table '{0}' in synchronization scope '{1}'.
ErrorMessage.ErrorCause: Error might have occurred while enumerating Insert/Delete/Update changes at the Server provider.

ErrorMessage.ErrorFormat: The '{0}' enumeration value, '{1}', is not valid.

Table name '{0}' is not valid. This might be caused by one or more of the following issues: unable to find a SyncAdapter for the specified SyncTable; the table name is null or empty; or the table name contains the keywords SET, FMTONLY, and OFF.
Unable to add the SyncAdapter to the SyncAdapterCollection. A SyncAdapter for table '{0}' already exists.
ErrorMessage.ErrorCause: Each table must have a unique SyncAdapter

ErrorMessage.ErrorFormat: The parameter '{0}' does not exist in the SyncParameterCollection.
The parameter '{0}' already exists in the SyncParameterCollection.
Invalid connection object. Unable to create a new instance of the connection object.
Failed to execute the command '{0}' for table '{1}'.
ErrorMessage.ErrorCause: The command failed and it rolled-back the transaction
ErrorMessage.ErrorCorrectiveAction: Make sure the command syntax is correct and it won't cause error that will roll-back the transaction

ErrorMessage.ErrorFormat: Missing value for primary key '{0}' in table '{1}'
